item.title: homework #0
item.description: Homework generously provided by the Data Science in Business Analytics class. This homework is optional and is not graded. In this optional tutorial you will get an overview of the basic programming concepts in R and main data types. Just enough to get you up and running essential R code. However, for true “beginners”, we highly recommend going through Advanced R - Chapter ‘Foundations’ from which the content of this assignment is mainly (mostly) inspired by.
